channel.title: Smfnew Forums
channel.description:
Hey Moparscapians,
I've used SMFNEW for a while now, they're really good. But I want to add my own stuff to it and my friends said that I can do that but I don't know.
If you help me you'll be Repped.

item.title: Smfnew Forums
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

If you still don’t know how to go to a hospital for a brain check.

Read full topic

item.title: Smfnew Forums
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:13, topic:401265”][quote author=FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz link=topic=498328.msg3644579#msg3644579 date=1309284597]
Okay this is what you do, go to www.000webhost.com and create a website with them you can buy or just stay free. Then find your website on 000webhost and then find FTP Details and download FileZilla Client from google. When you have that downloaded type in the details it gives you in the FTP Details. Then when thats done you want to go to www.simplemachines.org and download smf. Then upload the files that say upload i believe or it should just have a folder named public_html but anyways upload those files thats inside to your public_html directory in the FileZilla. Then go to your site and install it using the information that is provided on 000webhost. Also go to MySQL in 000webhost and create a database name that will be needed when installing smf to your site. Message me if you have any trouble with it. Oh yeah i forgot in order to add your own tabs you need to download a package called site menu from simplemachines and then just upload that directory to your site. Then find site menu on your site and modify that to your liking.
[/quote]
Repped.

I’ll rep more if you explain it a bit more.[/quote]
Okay,

  1. Go to www.000webhost.com
  2. Create a account with them and create a website.
  3. Find the website and go to it on 000webhost.
  4. Locate the FTP Details panel.
  5. Download FileZilla on google.
  6. At the top of the FileZilla there will be, Host, Password, and Username.
  7. Type in the details it gives you in the FTP Details on 000webhost.
  8. Create a database using MySQL on 000webhost(you will need to enter the database info when you install your site.
  9. When you entered the details to FileZilla click connect.
  10. Locate the public_html file in FileZilla(should be the first thing in it).
  11. When you download the files from simplemachines(smf) there should be a folder called upload or just public_html.
  12. Upload those files inside of the folder to FileZilla and put them in the public_html folder.
  13. Go to your site adress(www.yoursite.whatever.com)
  14. Install the site it should automatically open up if it doesn’t go to this link:(www.yoursite.whatever.com/install.php)
  15. Put in the info that is needed it should be self explanatory.
    Example for Database: The name you put for your database using MySQL.
    Example for Username: The same thing as the Database.
    For the password just enter the same password you put for the database.
    I hope this helped i explained it the best i could. Feel free to message me if you need help. I will try my best to answer your questions. Also my site address is www.deception.webege.com you can also locate me there.
    My skype name is: focused_kinetikz
    PSN: FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
    Live: cauze_havoc@live.com
    Feel free to add me on any of those i mentioned.

Read full topic

item.title: Smfnew Forums
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz:

Okay this is what you do, go to www.000webhost.com and create a website with them you can buy or just stay free. Then find your website on 000webhost and then find FTP Details and download FileZilla Client from google. When you have that downloaded type in the details it gives you in the FTP Details. Then when thats done you want to go to www.simplemachines.org and download smf. Then upload the files that say upload i believe or it should just have a folder named public_html but anyways upload those files thats inside to your public_html directory in the FileZilla. Then go to your site and install it using the information that is provided on 000webhost. Also go to MySQL in 000webhost and create a database name that will be needed when installing smf to your site. Message me if you have any trouble with it. Oh yeah i forgot in order to add your own tabs you need to download a package called site menu from simplemachines and then just upload that directory to your site. Then find site menu on your site and modify that to your liking.

Repped.

I’ll rep more if you explain it a bit more.

Read full topic

item.title: Smfnew Forums
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

Okay this is what you do, go to www.000webhost.com and create a website with them you can buy or just stay free. Then find your website on 000webhost and then find FTP Details and download FileZilla Client from google. When you have that downloaded type in the details it gives you in the FTP Details. Then when thats done you want to go to www.simplemachines.org and download smf. Then upload the files that say upload i believe or it should just have a folder named public_html but anyways upload those files thats inside to your public_html directory in the FileZilla. Then go to your site and install it using the information that is provided on 000webhost. Also go to MySQL in 000webhost and create a database name that will be needed when installing smf to your site. Message me if you have any trouble with it. Oh yeah i forgot in order to add your own tabs you need to download a package called site menu from simplemachines and then just upload that directory to your site. Then find site menu on your site and modify that to your liking.

Read full topic
